snippet: The attack could signal a further spread into Lebanon of the civil war in Syria, but no group immediately took responsibility for the abduction.
abstract: Armed assailants in Lebanon intercept bus carrying Turkish Airlines personnel from city's airport to central Beirut and kidnap a pilot and co-pilot; attack could signal a further spread into Lebanon of the civil war in Syria, but no group immediately takes responsibility for the abduction.

byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and ANNE BARNARD
byline.contributor: Alan Cowell contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The attack could signal a further spread into Lebanon of the civil war in Syria, but no group immediately took responsibility for the abduction.

headline.main: Turkish Pilots Kidnapped by Gunmen in Beirut
headline.print_headline: Turkish Pilots Kidnapped By Gunmen In Beirut
